DOC.brief_title: Study Hepalatide ( L47 ) Phase Ib Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blinded , dose escalating , phase Ib trial , conduct No . 302 Hospital China . There three cohort dose 4.2mg , 6.3mg 8.4mg . All healthy volunteer randomize Hepalatide placebo group 4:1 rate , healthy volunteer receive treatment drug abdominal subcutaneous injection day seven day observe 3 day .
